description: NTS Map: 082J07Elevation Gain: 368 mThis is number 67 in Backcountry Biking in the Canadian Rockies.  The trail climbs steadily on an old road (reverting to doubletrack) past some former sawmill sites, and then follows a creek to finish at Odlum Pond. Only the last 1 km is technical. There is GPS data attached to this trail (see "download GPS"), which if loaded into your GPS can help you find route points.
directions: Park at Lineham Creek Picnic Area, 10 km north of Highwood junction (South end of Hwy 40, Kananaskis Highway). Go north 200m on the west side of the highway to the gated trailhead.
title: Odlum Pond
